import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigation}from"../Router/Router";import"./css/PayPage.css";import Axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var PayPage=function PayPage(){var _useNavigation=useNavigation(),onClickStart=_useNavigation.onClickStart,onClickOwner=_useNavigation.onClickOwner,onClickPay=_useNavigation.onClickPay,onClickDone=_useNavigation.onClickDone,onClickMain=_useNavigation.onClickMain;function onClickPayment(){/* 1. 가맹점 식별하기 */var _window=window,IMP=_window.IMP;IMP.init('imp41444282');/* 2. 결제 데이터 정의하기 */var data={pg:'html5_inicis',// PG사
pay_method:'card',// 결제수단
merchant_uid:"mid_".concat(new Date().getTime()),// 주문번호
amount:1000,// 결제금액
name:'아임포트 결제 데이터 분석',// 주문명
buyer_name:'홍길동',// 구매자 이름
buyer_tel:'01012341234',// 구매자 전화번호
buyer_email:'example@example',// 구매자 이메일
buyer_addr:'신사동 661-16',// 구매자 주소
buyer_postcode:'06018'// 구매자 우편번호
};/* 4. 결제 창 호출하기 */IMP.request_pay(data,callback);}/* 3. 콜백 함수 정의하기 */function callback(response){var success=response.success,merchant_uid=response.merchant_uid,error_msg=response.error_msg;if(success){alert('결제 성공');}else{alert("\uACB0\uC81C \uC2E4\uD328: ".concat(error_msg));}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wrapper1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Header1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"goods1",children:"1. \uC0C1\uD488\uD655\uC778"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pay1",children:"2. \uACB0\uC81C \uBC29\uBC95"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"done1",children:"3. \uACB0\uC81C \uC644\uB8CC"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"txt",children:"\uACB0\uC81C \uC218\uB2E8\uC744 \uC120\uD0DD\uD574\uC8FC\uC138\uC694"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"selectCash",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cash",onClick:onClickPayment,children:"\uCE74\uCE74\uC624\uD398\uC774"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"card",onClick:onClickDone,children:"\uD604\uAE08"})]})]})]});};export default PayPage;
